notes: Not only these creatures are immune to [[Fire]], they actually get healed by it. Their relatively low power relative to their experience reward makes them popular targets for players who are focused entirely on gaining experience, regardless of waste.
history: Until the [[Updates/11.00#11.54.6216|Update 11.54]], these creatures were also called [[Lava Lurker]]s, but were renamed to avoid mix-ups.
name: Ravenous Lava Lurker
location: [[Gnome Deep Hub]] in the Gnomish area.
strategy: [[Mages]] can avoid their melee attack by blocking them off using a [[Crate]] or [[Parcel]]. Using [[Avalanche Rune]] as they often come in groups.
